com.example.winecellarapp.notification

Class GlobalNotificationSharedPref

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.winecellarapp.notification.GlobalNotificationSharedPref

  • public class GlobalNotificationSharedPref
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jakub Piga Class responsible for storing shared preferences to know what notification is displayed
